means: 烟熏的大麻叶和花；（印度）大麻

word_mean: 亚洲印度大麻 (Cannabis sativa)制剂，从培植的各种成熟雌性大麻叶精选制作的浸剂。它可作烟抽，当混合制成糖果时，称为大麻(majoon)

PerfectNetExp.abs: ganglioside 神经节苷脂ganja 印度大麻Ganser symptom 甘塞尔症状
2012.11.25 电影词汇：《两杆大烟枪》 ... Horrible shit 鬼东西 ganja, 大麻 that’s more like it 那还差不多.
ganivet 加尼韦, ganja 称为大麻, ganiyev 加尼耶夫

means.word_mean: 1. a strong-smelling plant from whose dried leaves a number of euphoriant and hallucinogenic drugs are prepared
2. the most commonly used illicit drug; considered a soft drug, it consists of the dried leaves of the hemp plant; smoked or chewed for euphoric effect
